snippet: The Washington City Council on Tuesday unanimously approved raising the minimum wage to $11.50 an hour, one of the highest rates among American cities.
abstract: Washington City Council unanimously approves raising minimum wage to $11.50 an hour, from $8.25, one of highest rates among American cities.
lead_paragraph: The Washington City Council on Tuesday unanimously approved raising the minimum wage to $11.50 an hour, one of the highest rates among American cities.

headline.main: Washington City Council Raises Minimum Wage to $11.50
headline.print_headline: City Council Raises Minimum Wage to $11.50
